title: Ariat Men's Solid Twill Classic Fit Shirt
description: CASUAL WESTERN SHIRT: A western look that will please any lifestyle, this easy-wearing Ariat long-sleeve shirt for men boasts durable twill cotton fabric and double-needle topstitch for added reinforcement

CLASSIC FIT: Featuring a generous fit, this men's casual shirt has an extended body length to ensure your shirttail stays tucked for a clean look; The cotton construction makes an ideal choice to stay comfortable during busy days
FREEDOM OF MOVEMENT: Comfortable and tough, this solid twill cotton shirt features Greater Arm Mobility technology for extended inseam construction that provides for maximum range of motion

ADDITIONAL FEATURES: This shirt features a handsome button-down collar, button-down placket on the front, two-button adjustable cuffs, and a single patch pocket on the left chest sporting the Ariat logo embroidery

SCIENCE OF INNOVATION: Ariat excels in advanced technologies to deliver products that outperform in various conditions; Partnering with world-class biomechanical research groups and testing labs, Ariat strives to improve performance, comfort, and durability
Capturing the essence of Western style, our casual shirts blend rugged handsomeness with comfort and quality construction.
